title: Breakthrough: Finding Certainty in the AI Era
description: Navigate through the fog of technology cycles, find your anchor of personal value in the AI wave, build a new dynamic system, and gain the inner certainty and confidence to transcend cycles.

title: Gather: Exploring the Source of Innovation in Community
description: Move beyond the bottleneck of individual learning, dive deep into open source communities, connect with collective wisdom through collaboration and contribution, and explore the living waters that nurture great innovations.

title: Create: Master AI to Achieve Your Da Vinci Moment
description: Infuse AI with your own taste and feelings, unleash creativity and imagination, and start your own renaissance.

title: Sustain: Let Passion Become a Sustainable Business Model
description: Master the methods of creation and collaboration in the AI era, connect with your '1000 true fans', build your own 'New Medici Effect', and turn passion into sustainable business.
